notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: H.D.; preparation of essential oils and performance of insecticidal tests; R.E.M.; plants selection, collection and identification. I.C.; supervision of insecticidal tests; S.N.; performance of antifungal tests; F.M. and G.C.; composition analysis; paper correction and editing.; S.H.; experimental supervision and revision of original draft. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
